title: Will US Capitol Get a Permanent Security Fence?
subtitle: A 7-foot-tall fence was erected following the Jan. 6, 2021, insurrection at the U.S. Capitol, and now more security improvements are under review.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: A permanent perimeter fence is planned for the U.S. Capitol in response to the Jan. 6, 2021, insurrection.
